get.description: This API fetches the statistics related to help articles in your Knowledge Base.

parameters.name: statsType
parameters.description: Type of statistical data that must be fetched. Values allowed are: ARTICLES_REFERENCED, VOTED_PORTAL_USERS, CREATED_ARTICLES and MODIFIED_ARTICLES

schema.description: Type of statistical data that must be fetched. Values allowed are: ARTICLES_REFERENCED, VOTED_PORTAL_USERS, CREATED_ARTICLES and MODIFIED_ARTICLES

get.summary: Get data related to trend of Knowledge Base
get.description: This API fetches data related to the overall trend of user actions recorded in your Knowledge Base.

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description: User visibility permission set for the translation. Values allowed are: !@ALL,@! !@REGISTEREDUSERS@! and !@AGENTS@!.

schema.description: User visibility permission set for the translation. Values allowed are: !@ALL,@! !@REGISTEREDUSERS@! and !@AGENTS@!.
x-custom-parameters-attributes: User visibility permission set for the translation. Values allowed are: !@ALL,@! !@REGISTEREDUSERS@! and !@AGENTS@!.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Publishing status of the translation. Values allowed are: Draft, Published, Review, Expired and Unpublished.

schema.description: Publishing status of the translation. Values allowed are: Draft, Published, Review, Expired and Unpublished.

post.summary: Reset metrics of a translation in the article
post.description: This API resets the metrics on a translated version of an article.

post.summary: Reset metrics of all translations in the article
post.description: This API resets the metrics on all translated versions of an article.

get.summary: Get data related to translation trend
get.description: This API fetches data related to the trend of user actions recorded on a particular translation of a help article.
This API fetches statistics related to keywords used for finding help articles.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Duration about to get the search keywords stats. Allowed Values LAST_24_HRS, LAST_7_DAYS, LAST_30_DAYS, LAST_365_DAYS and yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ,yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ. Default value : !@LAST_365_DAYS@!

schema.description: Duration about to get the search keywords stats. Allowed Values LAST_24_HRS, LAST_7_DAYS, LAST_30_DAYS, LAST_365_DAYS and yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ,yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ. Default value : !@LAST_365_DAYS@!

parameters.name: departmentId
parameters.description: Department to get the search keywords count. If departmentId is not given, it considered as all department

schema.description: Department to get the search keywords count. If departmentId is not given, it considered as all department

parameters.name: searchMetricsType
parameters.description: Search metrics type. If not given, it will return both failure and popular keywords. Allowed Values !@SUCCESS,@! !@FAILURE@!

schema.description: Search metrics type. If not given, it will return both failure and popular keywords. Allowed Values !@SUCCESS,@! !@FAILURE@!

get.summary: List users who interacted with your Knowledge Base
get.description: This API lists a particular number of users who interacted with multiple help articles, based on the limit specified.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of users to list. The default value is 10 and the maximum value allowed is 100.

schema.description: Number of users to list. The default value is 10 and the maximum value allowed is 100.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action that the users performed. Values allowed are !@LIKE@! and !@DISLIKE@!. default value is !@LIKE@!

schema.description: Action that the users performed. Values allowed are !@LIKE@! and !@DISLIKE@!. default value is !@LIKE@!
x-custom-parameters-attributes: User action whose trend-related records must be fetched. Values allowed are: !@LIKE,@! !@DISLIKE,@! !@VIEW,@! !@TICKET_USAGE,@! !@COMMENT@! and !@FEEDBACK@!. If you do not pass a value, all actions are included.

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: Type of users. Values allowed are: !@AGENTS,@! !@REGISTERED_USERS@! and !@ALL_USERS@! (default).

schema.description: Type of users. Values allowed are: !@AGENTS,@! !@REGISTERED_USERS@! and !@ALL_USERS@! (default).

get.summary: Get data related to article trend
get.description: This API fetches data related to the trend of user actions recorded on a help article and all of its translations.

post.summary: Generate real-time report of top articles
post.description: This API generates a real-time report of help articles that received the most number of user actions.

post.summary: Update metrics of all translations in the article
post.description: This API updates the metrics on all translated versions of an article.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of top article translations matching a particular criteria, based on the limit specified.

parameters.name: includeActionCounts
parameters.description: Additional information related to the action. Values allowed are: !@LIKE,@! !@DISLIKE,@! !@VIEW,@! !@TICKET_USAGE,@! !@COMMENT@! and !@FEEDBACK@!

schema.description: Additional information related to the action. Values allowed are: !@LIKE,@! !@DISLIKE,@! !@VIEW,@! !@TICKET_USAGE,@! !@COMMENT@! and !@FEEDBACK@!

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of translations to list. The default value is 10 and the maximum value allowed is 50.

schema.description: Number of translations to list. The default value is 10 and the maximum value allowed is 50.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: User action that serves as the condition to apply. Values allowed are: !@LIKE,@! !@DISLIKE,@! !@VIEW,@! !@TICKET_USAGE,@! !@COMMENT@! and !@FEEDBACK@!

schema.description: User action that serves as the condition to apply. Values allowed are: !@LIKE,@! !@DISLIKE,@! !@VIEW,@! !@TICKET_USAGE,@! !@COMMENT@! and !@FEEDBACK@!

action.description: User action that must be considered for the report. Values allowed are: LIKE, DISLIKE, VIEW, TICKET_USAGE, COMMENT, and FEEDBACK.

timeRange.description: Period in which the user actions were performed. Values allowed are: LAST_24_HRS, LAST_7_DAYS (default value), LAST_30_DAYS, and LAST_365_DAYS.

timeRange.description: Key that filters metrics added within a specific date and time range. Enter the time range in the formats of: !@LAST_24_HRS,@! !@LAST_7_DAYS,@! !@LAST_30_DAYS,@! !@LAST_365_DAYS@! and !@yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ,yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ@!
